titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards. s1: Route de Tonneins = crossed out, hard to read p. 2.35 = can't tell if "2f." or "28" (money or date) Jan 27 = "Harker"?

body.ab: July 1936 GRASSOT 9. rue des tanneries Mlle Pissot Mme R. 9 rue des became chez M.Y. Grassot Tanneries Route de Tonneins 13 Marmende (Lot et Garonne) Aug. 1. Good Earth. Darby + Joan Aug. 27 p. 3.60 Elizabeth + Essex Aug. 8 Aug. 8. Green Gates. Sept. 9 p. 2.10 Faster Faster Aug. 27 Oct 23. Sparkenbroke Jan 11 p. 2.80 Dec. 4 Mourning comes Electra p. 2.35 Jan 11 p. 2.35 Sent pc Dec Jan 27 sent bill + postage 30.85 Jan 27 Sand p. 1.80 Aug 3 (March 9th sent bill for subsc & postage 188.35) March. 19. Renewed Jan 1st 1937 - Jan 1st 1938. 157.50 by mandat 188.35 paid postage up to date 30.85 SB acknowledged March 19 - 37 July. 1. Silver Rattle p. 2.90 Aug 3. Aug. 6. They walk in the city p. 3.20 Aug 28 (Remennecourt par Rengry. Meuse)
